titleStmt.title: By the Lords-Justices of Ireland. Charles Porter, Tho: Coningesby. Information having been given us that divers of the auxiliary brigade of Danes commanded by the Duke of Wertemburge, have deserted and left their colours and remain in this kingdom, ...
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lords Justices and Council.
Coningsby, Thomas Coningsby, Earl, 1656?-1729.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook, assignee of Benjamin Tooke, printer to the King and Queen's most Excellent Majesties on Ormonde-Key,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and opening words of text.
"Given at their Majesties Castle of Dublin, the 21st day of March, 1691.".
Dates given according to Lady Day dating.
Steele notation: Arms 201. divers said Dublin,.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
